data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Perl let's you "bless" references, but not "unbless" them.
    Acme::Damn provides a single method "damn" that unblesses (or damns)
    a Perl object, returning the original, unblessed reference.

    I can't think of any reason why you'd want to do this, but that
    doesn't mean that you shouldn't be able to.
